example:font.name = 'Arial';

data_list.apis_recall:

data_list.apis_recall:
name: string;Specifies a value representing the font name.

name: string;Specifies a value representing the font name.

data_list.apis_recall:

data_list.apis_recall:
name: string;Specifies a value representing the font name.

data_list.query: remove any underline
data_list.apis_recall:
underline: Word.UnderlineType | "Mixed" | "None" | "Hidden" | "DotLine" | "Single" | "Word" | "Double" | "Thick" | "Dotted" | "DottedHeavy" | "DashLine" | "DashLineHeavy" | "DashLineLong" | "DashLineLongHeavy" | "DotDashLine" | "DotDashLineHeavy" | "TwoDotDashLine" | "TwoDotDashLineHeavy" | "Wave" | "WaveHeavy" | "WaveDouble";Specifies a value that indicates the underline type of the font. "None" if the font has no underlines. 
example:font.underline = 'Single';

data_list.query: apply an underline
data_list.apis_recall:
underline: Word.UnderlineType | "Mixed" | "None" | "Hidden" | "DotLine" | "Single" | "Word" | "Double" | "Thick" | "Dotted" | "DottedHeavy" | "DashLine" | "DashLineHeavy" | "DashLineLong" | "DashLineLongHeavy" | "DotDashLine" | "DotDashLineHeavy" | "TwoDotDashLine" | "TwoDotDashLineHeavy" | "Wave" | "WaveHeavy" | "WaveDouble";Specifies a value that indicates the underline type of the font. "None" if the font has no underlines. 
example:font.underline = 'Single';

data_list.query: add a Wave Double underline
data_list.apis_recall:
underline: Word.UnderlineType | "Mixed" | "None" | "Hidden" | "DotLine" | "Single" | "Word" | "Double" | "Thick" | "Dotted" | "DottedHeavy" | "DashLine" | "DashLineHeavy" | "DashLineLong" | "DashLineLongHeavy" | "DotDashLine" | "DotDashLineHeavy" | "TwoDotDashLine" | "TwoDotDashLineHeavy" | "Wave" | "WaveHeavy" | "WaveDouble";Specifies a value that indicates the underline type of the font. "None" if the font has no underlines. 
example:font.underline = 'Single';

data_list.query: Make the font in the first paragraph bold.
data_list.apis_recall:
bold: boolean;Specifies a value that indicates whether the font is bold. true if the font format is bold, false otherwise. 
example:font.bold = true;

data_list.query: Italicize the second paragraph.
data_list.apis_recall:
italic: boolean;Specifies a value that indicates whether the font is italic. true if the font is italic, false otherwise. 
example:font.italic = true;

data_list.query: Set the color of the third paragraph to gray.
data_list.apis_recall:
alignment: Specify the paragraph alignment. Possible values are "left", "centered", "right", or "justified". 
example:paragraph.outlineLevel = 1;

data_list.query: Adjust the font size of the fourth paragraph to 20 points.
data_list.apis_recall:
lineSpacing: number;Specifies the line spacing (in points) for the specified paragraph. In the Word UI, this value should be divided by 12 per time.1cm = 28.35 points
example:paragraph.lineSpacing = 10;

data_list.query: Modify the font of the fifth paragraph to Arial.
data_list.apis_recall:
name: string;Specifies a value representing the font name. 
example:font.name = 'Arial';

data_list.query: Make the font in the sixth paragraph unbold.
data_list.apis_recall:
bold: boolean;Specifies a value that indicates whether the font is bold. true if the font format is bold, false otherwise. 
example:font.bold = true;

data_list.query: Remove italic formatting for the seventh paragraph.
data_list.apis_recall:
italic: boolean;Specifies a value that indicates whether the font is italic. true if the font is italic, false otherwise. 
example:font.italic = true;

data_list.query: Set the color of the eighth paragraph to red.
data_list.apis_recall:
highlightColor: string;Specify the highlight color. To set it, use a value of the format "#RRGGBB" or a color name. To remove the highlight color, set it to null.nan
example:font.highlightColor = 'red';

data_list.query: Increase the font size of the ninth paragraph to 32 points.
data_list.apis_recall:
lineSpacing: number;Specifies the line spacing (in points) for the specified paragraph. In the Word UI, this value should be divided by 12 per time.1cm = 28.35 points
example:paragraph.lineSpacing = 10;

data_list.query: Modify the font of the tenth paragraph to SimHei.
data_list.apis_recall:
outlineLevel: number;Specifies the paragraph's outline level,1-10,10 is body text. 
example:paragraph.outlineLevel = 6

data_list.query: Set the selected part as a superscript.
data_list.apis_recall:
superscript: boolean;Specifies a value indicating whether the font is superscript. true if the font format is superscript, false otherwise. 
example:font.superscript = true;

data_list.query: Make the chosen text as the subscript.
data_list.apis_recall:
subscript: boolean;Specifies a value indicating whether the font is subscripted. true if the font format is subscript, false otherwise. 
example:font.subscript = true;
